QuestData.Title: Rallying the Earthen Ring
QuestData.Description: We must be rallyin' da Earthen Ring for dis fight. What we be lackin' in numbers, we make up for in strength.$B$BGo to tha temple and gather da restin' shaman from tha rear rooms. Norsala, Lorvarius, and I will be meetin' them at Lorthuna's Gate.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rally 5 shaman in the rear of the Temple of Earth, and then speak to Maruut Stonebinder.
QuestData.RewardText: You've done what I thought not possible. Quite impressive, $c.
